creator: tkang@cox.net
text:
Greetings,

Installed on the server is  Turbo Linux, Apache version 1.3.27-43, java version "1.6.0", the connector version is tomcat-connectors-1.2.26-src, and Tomcat ver 6.0.16. I would get an error message:
 "./configure: line 3803: unexpected EOF while looking for matching ``'
./configure: line 3807: syntax error: unexpected end of file" when I run this command " ./configure --with-apxs=/usr/sbin/apxs". Please help. 

I also tried the binary file "mod_jk-1.2.26-httpd-1.3.39-eapi.so", but it does not work with Apache.
This is the error meassage: 

"Syntax error on line 3 of /usr/java/apache-tomcat-6.0.16/conf/auto/mod_jk.conf:
Cannot load /usr/libexec/apache/mod_jk-1.2.26-httpd-1.3.39-eapi.so into server: /lib/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.3' not found (required by /usr/libexec/apache/mod_jk-1.2.26-httpd-1.3.39-eapi.so)"

Thank you in advance for all your help.

Best regards,


Tomsoo

This looks like a configuration issue rather than a bug to me.

Configuration issues are best handled on the users list so please re-post your question there. If that discussion concludes there is a bug then please re-open this issue and add the details of the bug.
creator: markt@apache.org
